insert into member (me_id, me_pw, me_email, me_name, me_phone, me_postcode, me_address, me_detailAddress, me_extraAddress, me_birth, me_authority) values (#{me.me_id}, #{me.me_pw}, #{me.me_email}, #{me.me_name}, #{me.me_phone}, #{me.me_postcode}, #{me.me_address}, #{me.me_detailAddress}, #{me.me_extraAddress}, current_timestamp(), "BRADMIN")

update member set me_id = #{me.me_id}, me_pw = #{me.me_pw}, me_email = #{me.me_email}, me_name = #{me.me_name}, me_phone = #{me.me_phone}, me_address = #{me.me_address} where me_name = #{br_ori_name};
